recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
Ensure impinger is turned on, preheated to 500°F, and belt time is 
set to 1 minute 20 seconds.

1. Cut torpedo roll in half. 

2. Place 4 oz of the BBQ Vegan Beef on the botton half of roll.

3. Place flatly on screen and run through impinger. 

4. Once completely out of impinger, place sandwich in a to-go container.

5. Top beef with 2oz of Vegan Cole Slaw.

6. Place top on sandwich and serve.
